content.raw: When looking into memory management, I noticed that the pimpl pointers in DART are not being set to null after being deleted, as the rest of our pimpl pointers. I did that on branch [physics_dart_nullptr_pimpl](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/physics_dart_nullptr_pimpl%0Dphysics_dart_nullptr#diff). Feel free to merge it into this PR, or I can make another PR for it.
content.html: When looking into memory management, I noticed that the pimpl pointers in DART are not being set to null after being deleted, as the rest of our pimpl pointers. I did that on branch physics_dart_nullptr_pimpl. Feel free to merge it into this PR, or I can make another PR for it.
